poems.name: Moon
poems.text:
you are my sun
no
you're better than the sun
you are my moon
you give me light in the middle of the dark

the darker my life gets
the more I know I need you in it
the more your radiance shines
but you are so far away

poems.name: Desano
poems.text:
gluten stretch and rebound
flower caked to the ground
the scent of marinara waft
voices murmur light and soft
Napoli fa pizza bella
my taste buds have found their Cinderella

poems.name: Ducks
poems.text:
oh for the courage of a duck
leap and not look back
to put life in the hands of luck
oh for the grace of a koi
simply be
to never apologize for having joy
oh for the memory of buildings
protect the ones you love
holding their secrets in your gilding
oh to be and just be
to know the person I call me
oh for the courage of a duck
